YIFY, I have been following your work for a long time now. First of all, thanks so much for all of the great HD movies you have supplied; your work is outstanding. You kept files small, while still maintaining quality. Second, my wife is hearing-impaired and you almost always include subs. You have allowed her to enjoy movies again. You'll never know what that has meant to her and our family. Thanks again to you and your team for the great work you do.
